achievements.title: AWS Solutions Architect Professional
achievements.description: Achieved AWS Solutions Architect Professional certification, demonstrating expert-level knowledge in designing distributed systems and AWS architecture.

achievements.title: Salesforce JavaScript Developer
achievements.description: Obtained Salesforce JavaScript Developer certification, validating expertise in building custom applications using JavaScript in the Salesforce ecosystem.

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: Led a team to victory in a 48-hour hackathon, developing an innovative solution for sustainable urban transportation.

achievements.title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate
achievements.description: Earned AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification, demonstrating proficiency in designing available, cost-efficient, and scalable AWS applications.

achievements.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
achievements.description: Obtained AWS Cloud Practitioner certification, validating comprehensive understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, and terminology.

achievements.title: Salesforce Administrator
achievements.description: Achieved Salesforce Administrator certification, proving expertise in managing and customizing Salesforce applications.
